body: Your eruptions of divine power move your enemies.
name: Greater Channel Force
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Aasimars/New Racial Rules/Aasimar Feats/Greater Channel Force

sections.body: Channel Force, Improved Channel Force, aasimar, channel energy 6d6.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: When using Improved Channel Force, you can affect all creatures in a 30-foot-radius burst.
sections.name: Benefit
